pages.text: Nnan: "acu i $ iu$en, ur nwala ara irgazen, i nella neesb iten seg imcumen mavi
Day nemsexxeo fellasen, ne$ dergen i wallen
Ih, aya d tidep, d amqellaa n at tmes
Ini: "nek, d aneddao kan. Ur illi oebbi siwa Oebbi, Yiwen, Aqehhao
Mass n tmurt, igenwan, akked wayen illan garasen, Uzmir Ipsemmieen
Ini: "d asali ameqwoahan
Kunwi, teooam t
Ur illi wayen eoi$ $eo le$wat aalayen meooa, mi mqellaan
Ppuweeea$ d kan, ar nek d aneddao ipbegginen
Mi Inna Mass ik i lmalayek: "Nek ad Xelqe$ amdan, si talaxt
Mi t Mesle$, Suve$ degs, si ooue iW, iinzemt $uoes, s lekni
Knant akw lmalayek, akken ma llant
siwa Iblis i izuxxen, illa seg ijehliyen
Inna: "A Iblis, w ik igedlen lekni i win Xelqe$ s ifassen iW? Tzuxxev, ne$ telliv seg wid iufraren
Inna: "Nek ife$ t. Txelqev iyi si tmes, Txelqev t si talaxt
Inna: "Effe$ segs, kecc d imenfi
Inna: "fellak xezzu, alamma d ass iqeiiiyen
Inna: "A Mass iw, eoo iyi ar ass ideg ara d kkren
Inna: "kecc, ih, seg wid Ooi
ar ass n wukud ipwassnen
Inna: "s tezmert iK, a ten $ewwu$, akken ma llan
siwa imdanen iK izedganen segsen
